ApplicationData.text: LITpro is the JMMC model fitting software for astronomical optical interferometry data.
ApplicationData.authors: CRAL, IPAG and LAGRANGE laboratories, and the JMMC Technical Group
ApplicationData.sampdescription: Model fitting software for astronomical optical interferometry data

package.name: jMAL
package.description: JMMC library to provide common astronomical computations (coordinate conversion, SIMBAD star resolver and analytical object models in interferometry)

package.name: OIFits Explorer core
package.description: OIFits Explorer core is the JMMC library dedicated to share OIFits GUI components (plots)

package.name: OITools
package.description: OITools is the JMMC library dedicated to OIFits manipulation (load, save and validation)

package.name: nom.tam.fits
package.description: The Java FITS library (nom.tam.fits) has been developed which provides efficient I/O for FITS images and binary tables. Made by Dr Thomas A. McGlynn, HEASARC

package.name: CDS_SpType
package.description: Get information from spectral type of stellar objects. Provided by CDS

package.name: CERN colt
package.description: provides a set of Open Source Libraries for High Performance Scientific and Technical Computing in Java
package.license: Copyright (c) 1999 CERN - European Organization for Nuclear Research

package.name: castor
package.description: Create Java classes from XSD schema

menu.label: Send model image
menu.description: send your model image to any Fits Image application SAMP compliant

prerelease.change: Major GUI speedup. No longer uv-point limits. Result plots displayed on demand. More to come.
Result summary displayed in the result panel (was lost in last previous versions).
Replace validation report dialog while loading OIFits by status bar message ( shown in the application log).
New interop menu entry to send a model image to any fits image reader.
Move to asynchronous client-server mode: chi2 maps or genfit process easyly can reach timeouts
Make long process interruptible in the same way as run fit
Make shared_param removable
Fix file selection bug when all are unselected
File can be removed but must not be used by any target. Make file removable in all cases.
Fix ghostscript error for Radial plots + residuals
Enhance parameter handling in the Plot Chi2 with fit
Display best chi2 solutions after chi2 map
Experimental support for genetic fitter (in prep. / dev only)

release.change: Model names can not be renamed anylonger (so that numbering in param label should stay consistent)
Run fit action can now be cancelled

prerelease.change: Add CUNIT=deg in the fits images of the model
Fix loading of oifits through samp from local files
The model library now provides blackbody models : background_BB, disk_BB, gaussian_BB, punct_BB, stretched_disk_BB, stretched_gaussian_BB
Model names can not be renamed anylonger (so that numbering in param label should stay consistent)
Run fit action can now be cancelled
Add load oifits file action in the menu entry and toolbar. User can start from scratch just loading data.
Use huge tooltips for model that includes it's description
Set inserted nodes visible in the main Settings tree (move scrollbar)
Increase default sampling values for chi2 maps and model image
Target panels sub-components moved to save space
Chi2 cuts can now be performed on every parameters (was limited to fitted parameters)
Chi2 cuts bounds are now reported immediatly if entered out of parameter's bounds
Chi2 map can be performed in probe mode (use 'run fit' check box)
Provide a checkbox to skip very long (and sometimes non working) processing inside the GUI - should be improved
Fix 'bad case' blocking error loading in the GUI some oifits
Fix support of running fit with a max iteration value over 1000
The height of the text summary below the 'Personal notebook' in the 'Result Panel' will not be smaller than 100px
File menu gets a new 'Recent File' menu entry
Diplay more informations for results and index them by datetime in the left tree and notebook.
Add a separator before adding the result summary in the notebook.
Use a jpg icon instead of the png previous one to work arround a known bug onto macos/java7
Use common XmlFactory for xslt transformations.
Use use jide checkboxLists.
Display all observables plots in the result nodes when opening an old settings file (was limited to current selected data)
Inline documentation updated.
Fix support of compressed files on the remote server side
Uncompressed OIFits files are now always zipped before beeing embedded in the xml setting.
Fix support of '*' in fits loaded filenames
Fix NPE in loss of focus from the empty cells of the parameters tables
Use default file chooser on Mac OS X (excepted for multiselection choosers)
Save action now save by default result nodes (use preferences to change behaviour)
Accept oifits through samp message table.load.fits (visit http://jmmc.fr/oidb)
Radial plots for T3 get new legends for spacial frequencies (max of the 3)
Handle oifits flags encoded as integer/short/char (0 indicates false else true)
... and many other things provided by the shared code between JMMC applications!!
Interactive plots get proper range to display amplitudes or phases
LITpro web service urls are reset and not shown in the preference window anylonger.
Magnified images produced by LITpro web service (yorick core)
Model UV maps are now displayed as an animation of images to highlight differences between the model and data
Fix error values in tsv export of some plots (with format change)
Fix java look and feel on some platforms
Fix CRPIX computed values to get proper centering on fits model images
Model's shared parameters can now be relinked to another shared parameter
Enhancement for multiple removals in the left settings tree
Replace 'sampling' by '#samples' in the chi2 plot panels
Fix broken Oifits file verifier in 'File Panel'
Fix Null Pointer Exception setting the proper state of the 'Add new Target' button in the Targets Panel
Improve error handling on the LITpro server side
'reduced' checkbox has been added in the chi2 panel to plot reduced and/or log chi2 maps
Improve reliability and make some error messages easier to understand
The notebook get exactly the content of yorick lp_show_fit after every fit action
Use VO protocol (Samp) to display fits tables (require topcat separate startup)
Fix bug that appeared after one target removal in some simple cases inside the plot panel
File given to application is now properly loaded on startup
Plots are now available only if the current settings get all requested parts (data+model)
If one empty value is given for the value of one parameter, no more exception is thrown but the parameter get not modified.
Use new error handling mecanisms
Use new feedback report (which saves your email adress in a preference file)
Display T3phi and VISphi data in degrees
Use new oifits library that fixes bug loading data tables with only one wavelength and using TDIM keywords (1)
Use new oifits library that fixes several bugs related to ASCII character encoding / decoding and ASCII_NULL support
Fix residual sign while plotting residual. (M-D)/sigma was plotted instead of (D-M)/sigma.
Avoid error for radial plots data in T3 residuals cases
Set 'weigthed residuals' instead of 'residuals' in some radial plot titles
Three webservice urls are defined by preferences according Alpha Beta or Production versions
Display version number in the application title bar for Alpha or Beta releases
Handle file extensions in loading/saving stages for oifits and xml setting files
Fix 'Prefix string too short' bug while saving in temporary file
Fix UV coverage plots in the file panel for t3data
Use new Topcat release 3.6
Use new jmmc java library to manage oifits files
Set radian unit label instead of degree for T3Phi or VisPhi plots of oifits files
Support reception of new setting from aspro using VO samp technology
Do not overplot model on radial plots when T3 data are selected
Throw one feedback report if the 'get yoga version' action fails (called from preference panel)
Set real sigma value for error bar and not half value
Fix xsl processing that generated one RunTime Error with math extension
Application download from web site asks to create an application shortcut to the desktop. This is not handled by all operating systems...
Chi2 plot's bounds can be decimal
Allow to perform residual plots only on observables that are in the file and included into the associated residual settings of the targets.
Change the title of the chi2 panel: Cuts in the chi2 space panel
Add the common panel (click on the plots node of the settings tree) that enables plotting with a higher granularity
Add the personal notebook widget into the result panels
The USAGE messages of the LITpro engine are now displayed as error. It makes some error messages much more clear.
Fix behaviour on parameters editing. User does not have to validate using enter key.
The widgets of the chi2 plots have been changed to be more intuitive and chi2 can be plotted in log
The bounds values of the chi2 parameters are changed on every parameter change
Add one header to the TSV exported files
Set the user info field with a post-it-like background
The angle of radial plots is displayed in the label presented into the left tree and can get decimals
The radial plot can now get different angles
Model Image and UVMap image are now exported into fits file in addition to pdf and png
One system property is set on the machines which require one proxy for the web services (httpclient)
The LITpro engine has been updated to plot images in the right orientation and draw color bars
Shared parameters are now properly displayed in the table(type was wrong)
Move the standard deviation column into the result panel
Fix handling of 1x1 arrays that could result in non displayed values (empty result plots )
Show validation results of input files before doing anything else
Use proxy parameters to access the LITpro remote webservice
Improve efficiency during the reading of the webservice return
First public release

ApplicationData.acknowledgment:
This research has made use of the Jean-Marie Mariotti Center \texttt{LITpro} service co-developped by CRAL, IPAG and LAGRANGE. \footnote{LITpro software available at http://www.jmmc.fr/litpro}
